detaileddescription.para:
Create an image objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new button
copy
pointer to a image object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created image

Set the pixel map to display by the image
img
pointer to an image object
data
the image data

Enable the auto size feature. If enabled the object size will be same as the picture size.
img
pointer to an image
en
true: auto size enable, false: auto size disable

Set an offset for the source of an image. so the image will be displayed from the new origin.
img
pointer to an image
x
the new offset along x axis.

Set an offset for the source of an image. so the image will be displayed from the new origin.
img
pointer to an image
y
the new offset along y axis.

Set the style of an image
img
pointer to an image object
type
which style should be set (can be only LV_IMG_STYLE_MAIN)
style
pointer to a style

Get the source of the image
img
pointer to an image object
the image source (symbol, file name or C array)

Get the name of the file set for an image
img
pointer to an image
file name

Get the auto size enable attribute
img
pointer to an image
true: auto size is enabled, false: auto size is disabled

Get the offset.x attribute of the img object.
img
pointer to an image
offset.x value.

Get the offset.y attribute of the img object.
img
pointer to an image
offset.y value.

Get the style of an image object
img
pointer to an image object
type
which style should be get (can be only LV_IMG_STYLE_MAIN)
pointer to the image's style
